title: Bug 109573Focus in outline view can't be synchronized with focus in layout view when multiselect rows in a grid.
description: Description: Focus in outline view can't be synchronized with focus in layoutview when multiselect rows in a grid.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Bug 109573Focus in outline view can't be synchronized with focus in layout view when multiselect rows in a grid. Only one row is focused in layout view.
SR: Select two rows in a grid in outline view.2.
